BEM VINDO! WELCOME!
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/speedoz123 YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/speedozgaming
PS: 6L significa a progressao das gems que voce vai colocar caso ainda nao tenha um 6 Links. PS: 6L means the gems progression in case you don't have a 6 Links yet.
Leveling CA/TR: Quill Rain Bow ============================================ ACT 1 ============================================ 6L: Caustic Arrow - Pierce - Onslaught - Lesser Poison - Void Manipulation - Mirage Archer
2L: Flame Dash - Arcane Surge lvl 1 2L: Spell Totem - Wither - Smoke Mine - Flame Dash - Clarity
============================================ ACT 2 ============================================ 6L: Toxic Rain - Faster Attacks - Onslaught - Vicious Projectiles - Void Manipulation - Mirage Archer
2L: Flame Dash - Arcane Surge lvl 1 3L: Spell Totem - Wither - Faster Casting - Blood Rage - Smoke Mine - Clarity - Herald of Agony
============================================ ACT 3 ============================================ 6L: Toxic Rain - Faster Attacks - Onslaught - Vicious Projectiles - Void Manipulation - Mirage Archer
2L: Flame Dash - Arcane Surge lvl 1 3L: Spell Totem - Wither - Faster Casting - Blood Rage - Smoke Mine - Flame Dash - Clarity - Herald of Agony - Malevolence
============================================ ACT 4 ============================================ 6L: Toxic Rain - Faster Attacks - Onslaught - Vicious Projectiles - Void Manipulation - Mirage Archer
2L: Flame Dash - Arcane Surge lvl 1 3L: Spell Totem - Wither - Faster Casting - Blood Rage - Smoke Mine - Flame Dash - Clarity - Herald of Agony - Malevolence
============================================ ACT 6 ============================================ 6L: Toxic Rain - Swift Affliction - Efficacy - Concentrated Effect - Void Manipulation - Vicious Projectiles / Mirage Archer
2L: Flame Dash - Arcane Surge lvl 1 3L: Spell Totem - Wither - Faster Casting - Blood Rage - Smoke Mine - Flame Dash - Clarity - Herald of Agony - Malevolence
